import ghpythonlib.treehelpers as th
# from ghpythonlib.componentbase import dotnetcompiledcomponent as component
import Grasshopper, GhPython
import System
import Rhino
from Rhino.Geometry import *

# Initialize a new DataTree
LayerGeometry= Geometry.Branch(LayerNumber)
LayerName = LayerNames.Branch(LayerNumber)
                
LayerAttributes = []
LayerValues = []
for i in range(Attributes.BranchCount):
    branchPath = Attributes.Path(i)
    
    if branchPath.Indices[0] == LayerNumber:
        LayerAttributes.append(list(Attributes.Branch(i)))
        LayerValues.append(list(Values.Branch(i)))
LayerGeometry = th.list_to_tree(LayerGeometry)
LayerAttributes = th.list_to_tree(LayerAttributes, source=[0,0])
LayerValues = th.list_to_tree(LayerValues, source=[0,0])
